name: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare - Free Trial
name_original: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare - Free Trial
description:
When playing on PS5, this game may exhibit errors or unexpected behavior and some features available on PS4 may be absent. To play this game on PS5, your system may need to be updated to the latest system software. See PlayStation.com/bc for more details.
The Call of Duty®: Infinite Warfare Free Trial event is live now

For a limited time, experience Multiplayer (Level Cap 15), Zombies (Level Cap 3), and Campaign (Rising Threat & Black Sky).

This trial is a full game download of approximately 65 GB.


Multiplayer combines player focused map design, deep customization, and a brand new combat rig system to create an intense gameplay experience.


Zombies will transport players back in time to a 1980s amusement park, complete with a plethora of rides.


In Campaign, human conflict has spread throughout our solar system, and the player will embark in grand scale war.


All Player Progress from the previous trial event will carry over to the latest trial and to the full game on purchase.




Online features may be terminated at any time.



Offline multiplayer (2-4 players)
Online multiplayer (2-18 players). A paid-for PlayStation Plus membership is required. Online features require an account and are subject to our terms of service (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service), our privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy), and the game publisher’s privacy policy.
Uses DUALSHOCK 4 vibration function
Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service), privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy), and the game publisher’s privacy policy.


Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).

One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
